website_summaries.verdict: Once you find the perfect size and get through the break-in period, chances are you will like the way these shoes feel, look, and perform on the court.
pros: This mid-top shoe with the brand's heel Air unit earns praise for the support it provides from the ankle to the sole of the food
features sturdy material that "breathes" for added comfort
cons: Will likely require a break-in period for optimal comfort
Fits a bit snug on some, which may ease up once broken in

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes and fit as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. I play indoor basketball with these and they have great ankle support, arch support and traction. I normally wear an 11 and ordered these in 11, and they fit perfectly. I've played at least 4-5 hours in them, with no break-in around the house, and had no discomfort or blisters at all.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Green

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: These fit my picky 10 year old great. He has wide feet and is funny about textures and fits, but he loved wearing these. They also had good traction on the basketball court. It's too bad he outgrew them, but he wore then all last season. He also liked the look of them - and he also liked them for the Nike brand too, of course, since kids care about their brands at this age.
customer_reviews.author: DevotedMomWifeNurse

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes for the price, a little heavy. I would recommend for those who are not serious basketball players and just need some sneakers for weekend pick-up games.
customer_reviews.author: G. Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Could not wear these.
customer_reviews.text: These fit nothing like the original pair I had in women's. First off both shoes are leaning inward which makes for a weird fit & the cushioning is not comfortable. I believe these to be a bad knock-off
customer_reviews.author: Shortcake

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy shoe. 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Been playing with these shoes for two weeks and man the difference between these shoes and my previous Nike basketball shoes is insane! No more pain after playing. These are very supportive on the ankles. Sturdy shoe. 5 stars. Can't go wrong for the price either.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: I bought these as a birthday present for my boyfriend ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a birthday present for my boyfriend. He is a size 11 1/2 and they fit perfectly for him. They are very stylish and match well with just about anything. They are very high quality for the price range.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super shoes at a fair price!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful shoe at this price point! I removed the thin layer of soul padding, and added some Spence orthotics, and these shoes are wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: I like that the back part is designed to cup and ...
customer_reviews.text: My son has foot issues and these support well. I like that the back part is designed to cup and support his heel. Also they are pretty rugged, and fulfills his need for his footwear to blend in with everyone else's without putting us in the poorhouse.
customer_reviews.author: AEH

customer_reviews.title: Good buy and good wear, doing 5-6 miles, 5-6 days a week.
customer_reviews.text: This particular shoe has been my standby for about 10 years. I need the ankle support for jogging, and regular jogging shoes won't give it. Also about half the price I had been paying for my jogging shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Kitsko

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our grandson and he loves the product. Nice look, good performance and great fit, can't ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph R.

customer_reviews.title: Laces are kind of short as well but otherwise nice shoes in a style I like
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised that the sides of the shoes had mesh because I did not expect this on the shoes from looking at them. Laces are kind of short as well but otherwise nice shoes in a style I like.
customer_reviews.author: joy9281

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes, my fault
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes, my fault, ordered half size too small as these things vary by manufacturer. Wore them a few times to be sure... wish I would have exchanged them right away. But my fault, good shoes. :(
customer_reviews.author: Dablerinca

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of the best and comfortable shoes I have worn.
customer_reviews.author: J. R.

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: These things hurt my feet after walking for just a couple hours
customer_reviews.author: sam7759

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a decent price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a decent price. I just started getting into basketball and these shoes work great: nice fit and comfort and not outrageously expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Marshall

customer_reviews.title: He's a happy customer
customer_reviews.text: My Husband is in love with his sneakers great price the style of them are so nice look good on his feet I give them 4 Stars a little tight but order the right size they fit
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Left one is still good, right one seen better days
customer_reviews.author: zion

customer_reviews.title: Nike Needs to Make Wide Sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Sneaker companies like Nike and New Balance need to make mid and high top basketball shoes for people with wide (E, 2E) feet. There are none on the market with a wide toe box and protection for the ankle.
customer_reviews.author: Steven A. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes and fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes! Very impressive speed of delivery. A pleasant and smooth purchase experience!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were a little tighter and smaller than other Nike's I have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: D.A.M,

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Prompt. Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Fit exactly per sizing. Top condition (shoes and packaging). Looks very sharp,’Thanks!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: GrammyGram

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these before and the fit and comfort are exceptional. However, I have not received them yet, but when I do I will let you know. Lincoln.
customer_reviews.author: Lincoln

customer_reviews.title: These were perfect for him
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my father. He likes "old school" basketball shoes. These were perfect for him!
customer_reviews.author: MM3AW

customer_reviews.title: ... purchased these sneakers in mid-December because they were exactly like the basketball shoes I was wearing and had been ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these sneakers in mid-December because they were exactly like the basketball shoes I was wearing and had been wearing for a few years. I typically buy 2 pairs a year. When they arrived the sole seemed thinner than it had in the past but I didn't think much about it. However, a few weeks ago at approximately the 3 month mark I noticed the rubber at the toe was separating from the leather. So despite the soles being fine I'll need a new pair of sneakers soon. But because of this pair of sneakers lasted so short a time I think I'm going to switch brands.
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: son-in-law is pleased. This is his second pair
customer_reviews.text: Gave as gift, son-in-law is pleased. This is his second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth E. Castor

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Great price! Fast delivery and true to it's size!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this on a Thursday afternoon and received it in the mail on Sunday morning (3 days later)! Great color and quality. It comes in the original Nike box and it fits great on me.
customer_reviews.author: Lemias Paige

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: All reviews stated size fits true but this was too small. Returned product and didn't ask for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: david bowen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy I was able to find these as Nike no longer makes them
customer_reviews.author: james brown

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves them! I was surprised they are actually nice shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Grammie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic products
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product .Perfectly wide for my feet and feels comfortable
customer_reviews.author: OMAR

customer_reviews.title: bad sole quality
customer_reviews.text: bad quality, the sole peeled off the shoe less than one year of occasional use
customer_reviews.author: Ivan chaves

customer_reviews.title: The only bad thing is I need to use a shoehorn to ...
customer_reviews.text: The only bad thing is I need to use a shoehorn to put them on. But once on they fit nice and snug.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Pacella

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Light!
customer_reviews.text: Solid basketball shoes. I wear a size 12 and the 12's I ordered fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, shoe tongue kinda short
customer_reviews.text: If you lace all the holes it can get pretty weird, the tongue it seems is not quite long enough. I roll my ankles easy so for years I've always worn high tops and it's helped a lot. It's hard to find ones I like but these are pretty good. My only issue is that when tying them to the top the lace gets a tad shorter than I'd like and the tongue tries to take a dive.
customer_reviews.author: C Fox

customer_reviews.title: Feels comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Just walking around right now... Pickelball coming up . Feels comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: wayne roberts

customer_reviews.title: he says they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these; he says they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: CKD

customer_reviews.title: Cool looking
customer_reviews.text: Received order very quick. Husband says just has to wear them to break them in. Cool looking great/black.
customer_reviews.author: Suz-Q & Toby

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my son's B.day..and he loves it. Great shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Work shoes
customer_reviews.text: Luv the sneakers an they was delivered really quick but I wish I could get them in all black for the same price I wear them for work
customer_reviews.author: Dre

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes!! I've played a couple games in them so far. Very comfortable, and I like the design and the colors a lot.
customer_reviews.author: jake shenoy

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy with results
customer_reviews.text: These shoes came and looked in perfect shape and fit well, but there is an extremely annoying lump on the bottom of the left shoe's sole. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoes, they are light on my feet and they fit just right!
customer_reviews.author: Ramona B.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The rubber at the toe separated from the leather in 5 months.
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Good fit, comfortable, only have had them for a week, but, I love them so far! I work on my feet a lot of the day, thought I would try the air version of this shoe, since I have the 'Non' air, and I like them. This shoe is so much better than the previous rendition!
customer_reviews.author: sewwat67

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected and very comfortable, he said
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my husband and he absolutely loves them! Fit as expected and very comfortable, he said. ☺
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome kicks & they dont cost an arm & a leg, probably gonna snag another pair
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Nike shoes
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes. Good price Delivery could have been sooner. Came on last day
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE!!! perfect for my picky hubby! ... and shipping was FAST!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Yes very happy with my shorts very happy with Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: MY SON LOVES HIS NEW SHOES HE GOT FOR CHRISTMAS
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... shoes creased badly in 2 days before smh I wasted my money I'm not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The shoes creased badly in 2 days before smh I wasted my money I'm not satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes! Fit my daughter perfectly as I ordered ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes! Fit my daughter perfectly as I ordered them a full size bigger as Nike's always run small
customer_reviews.author: LENEEKA MANNING

customer_reviews.title: Nike shoes always seem to run on the narrow side ...
customer_reviews.text: Nike shoes always seem to run on the narrow side, and I have yet to find any available in a wide width in any style I'd even wear. Overall, they are a decent shoe. No complaints, except that for whatever reason, the shoelaces are never long enough to lace up all the way and still be able to tie them.
customer_reviews.author: Savage Hulk

customer_reviews.title: Poor service
customer_reviews.text: I am not bashing the shoe itself, the shoe is great but the service that I received is horrible. I bought a size 10 and ended up getting a size 9 which is too small and on top of that returning it was a bitch, took too long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoe fine. Did not fit me well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Duffy

customer_reviews.title: I usualy weare a 10 and half.
customer_reviews.text: I usualy weare a 10 and half. so i orderd an 11 to make sure but that are a little to tight
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Nike Men's The Air Overplay IX Basketball Shoe
product_meta.description: You're ready for a drop-of-the-hat game in the versatile performance of The Air Overplay IX basketball sneaker from Nike.
